i will add more features just learning zeronet ;) i already have the knownledge of python,html,css,php etc ... how i push updates on zeronet ?

Okay found it :D isnt really there a way to paste a private key into command, since i want automate it via for example shell script ...


How can I modify a ZeroNet site?

    Modify files located in data/13DNDkMUExRf9Xa9ogwPKqp7zyHFEqbhC2 directory. After you’re finished:

$ zeronet.py siteSign 13DNDkMUExRf9Xa9ogwPKqp7zyHFEqbhC2
- Signing site: 13DNDkMUExRf9Xa9ogwPKqp7zyHFEqbhC2...
Private key (input hidden):

    Enter the private key you got when created the site, then:

$ zeronet.py sitePublish 13DNDkMUExRf9Xa9ogwPKqp7zyHFEqbhC2
...
Site:13DNDk..bhC2 Publishing to 3/10 peers...
Site:13DNDk..bhC2 Successfuly published to 3 peers
- Serving files....

    That’s it! You’ve successfully signed and published your modifications.

> [nofish](#comment_370_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): Sure, pass it as the second parameter after your sites address: zeronet.py siteSign 15WzFc5vFZqz4kdbHKnay8AaLWHzFsDLMH yourprivatekey --publish

simple as hell thx :D now just add into crontab and i am fine :D
